name: Feline Freedom Fighters
description:
Hullo...It is I, Nicole.

Kitler has been plastering his vile propaganda posters on billboards all over town, we need you to help spread the message about the Resistance and win back the town by spraying over all the billboards.

Be careful though, Kitler's social reinforcement police are patrolling the streets and will try to catch you if they spot you, so stay out of sight! Use open doorways to hide from those jack-booted thugs until they pass!

Viva la kitty treats! Viva La Revolución!

Controls

  • MOVE:
    • W,A,S,D or
    • ARROW KEYS
  • SPRINT:
    • SHIFT or
    • CTRL
  • SPRAY:
    • SPACE

ResistJam Team:

Tom Roberts - Code
Cao-Hsin Lee - Art and Audio
Lucy Bourn - Art
Liam Wyatt - Design
